item.description:
Hi All,

I have three tee times at Trull Brook Golf Course in Tewksbury for Saturday, May 5th starting at 12:00pm. Nice course situated along the Merrimack River.

We played here a couple of times last season and everyone seemed to enjoy it (although I'm unclear whether that was due to the course itself or the multiple beer carts they introduced last year.) $66 for 18 holes includes golf cart. Join if you can.

If you need to cancel, please do so by 11:30am on Friday, May 3rd.

More course info & directions:

http://trullbrook.com/golf/directions.aspx

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Trull Brook Golf Course - 18 holes
